definition: Wugang county level city in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan
Wugang county level city in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan

sentences.english: The phonetic sound of Wugang dialect has been lack of systematic study in academic world.
sentences.chinese: 學術界對武岡方言語音，一直缺乏系統的研究。

sentences.english: Officials at Wugang, the nearest town, say they did not know the smelter existed.
sentences.chinese: 武岡市官員表示，他們不知道有這家錳冶煉廠存在。
